title: LCB Clone V2 (Learning Project)
goal: Learn maintainable ASP.NET Core patterns using a realistic application domain.
bullets: Blazor frontend + .NET backend + shared DTO project + Unit Testing Project.
SQL database with Entity Framework Core (EF Core).
Currently uses Minimal APIs; planning a transition to controllers as learning progresses.

title: Digital Signage Tools
goal: Provide clear “always-on” time and weather screens when no meeting content is running.
bullets: Displays time and weather when there is no active meeting running in the hearing room.
Runs 24/7 on the internal display system.

title: Hearing Room Testing (Documentation)
goal: Documentation tool for recording microphone and camera issues during hearing room testing.
bullets: Supports printing to PDF for consistent record-keeping.
Includes hearing room microphone layouts for documenting problems.
Displays an indicator when a microphone or camera is flagged.

title: Information Bar (Digital Signage Text)
goal: Provide a simple, controlled way to update digital signage text using a text file.
bullets: Boss-requested signage utility that reads a .txt file and displays its contents as an information bar.
Text updates are made by editing a single file in the repository and redeploying via GitHub Pages.
Designed for clarity, low complexity, and predictable updates in an internal display environment.

title: Home Lab
goal: Learn practical networking fundamentals: routing, VPN, DNS, and self-hosted services.
bullets: Configured a VyOS router from scratch.
Set up and managed a WireGuard VPN on VyOS for remote access to internal services.
Configured Vlans on a Extreme 5520-24w switch running the VOSS OS.
Configured a Raspberry Pi as a local DNS server for ad blocking.
Set up a home server to host multiple services on the local network.

title: Radiant-Apparel e-Commerce App
goal: Demonstrate backend and database fundamentals with a real-world commerce application.
bullets: Java-based e-commerce platform with MVC architecture.
Implemented product catalog, shopping cart, and purchase flow.
Stripe integration for payments and secure order processing.

title: Budget Tracking and Visualization
goal: Track budgets, categories, and transactions using a persistent backend and interactive dashboard.
bullets: Full-stack application with a Node.js backend and JavaScript frontend.
Stores budget categories and transactions in a database.
Interactive dashboard updates dynamically as data changes.

title: PokeOrUs
goal: Build a full-stack Python web application integrating external APIs and Stripe for transactional features.
bullets: Full-stack application with a Python backend using Flask and a JavaScript-enabled frontend.
Consumes data from a public API and renders dynamic views using Flask templates.
Integrated Stripe for payment processing as part of the application workflow.
Demonstrates backend/frontend integration and third-party service usage.
